item.title: Southwest Airlines begins using FAA-mandated cockpit barriers on new Boeing jetliners
item.description: Southwest Airlines becomes the first carrier to fly a Boeing 737 Max 8 with new secondary flight deck barriers designed to prevent cockpit intrusions.
